    • Constructor Detail

      • AlertThresholds

        public AlertThresholds​(Detection3D detector,
                       double alerting_time,
                       double early_alerting_time,
                       BandsRegion region)
        Creates an alert threholds object. Parameter det is a detector, alerting_time is a non-negative alerting time (possibly positive infinity), early_alerting_time is a early alerting time >= at (for maneuver guidance), region is the type of guidance

      • getHorizontalDirectionSpread

        public double getHorizontalDirectionSpread()
        Get horizontal direction spread in internal units [rad]. Spread is relative to ownship's direction in the range [0,pi]

      • getHorizontalDirectionSpread

        public double getHorizontalDirectionSpread​(java.lang.String u)
        Get horizontal direction spread in given units [u]. Spread is relative to ownship's direction in the range [0,pi]

      • setHorizontalDirectionSpread

        public void setHorizontalDirectionSpread​(double spread)
        Set horizontal direction spread in internal units. Spread is relative to ownship's direction and is expected to be in [0,pi].

      • setHorizontalDirectionSpread

        public void setHorizontalDirectionSpread​(double spread,
                                         java.lang.String u)
        Set direction spread in given units. Spread is relative to ownship's direction and is expected to be in [0,pi] [u].

      • getHorizontalSpeedSpread

        public double getHorizontalSpeedSpread()
        Get horizontal speed spread in internal units [m/s]. Spread is relative to ownship's horizontal speed

      • getHorizontalSpeedSpread

        public double getHorizontalSpeedSpread​(java.lang.String u)
        Get horizontal speed spread in given units. Spread is relative to ownship's horizontal speed

      • setHorizontalSpeedSpread

      • setParameters

        public void setParameters​(ParameterData p)
        Description copied from interface: ParameterAcceptor
        Modify this object's parameters to match the given ParameterData object. Unrecognized keys are ignored. Any parameters in this object that are not in the given ParameterData object are left untouched.
        Specified by:
